definitions.definition: A red-orange dye obtained from brazil wood.
The hard, brown wood of a tree of the tribe Caesalpinieae; originally the sappan, Biancaea sappan, of the East Indies, and later the brazilwood, Paubrasilia echinata.

definitions.example: I picked up a handful of brazils from the bowl.

definitions.definition: A seam of coal containing iron pyrites
